ValidationRule.description: If a value of "No" is selected for the IRS Notice Received field, a user is required to select a value equal to 0 in the Notice Count field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( (RecordType.Name = 'Reference ESR Dedicated Service Record Type') || (RecordType.Name = 'Reference Benetrac ESR Dedicated Service Record Type') ), ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Notice_Count__c, "0")) ), ISPICKVAL(IRS_Notice_Received__c, "No") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a Notice Count value equal to 0 if IRS Notice Received equals "No".
